divs: sighting detailsthis sighting began in august of 2007, however we have had regular sightings continue to this day. very similar sounding to steve allens sightings in the virgin islands which prompted me to write this report. mostly stationary but have seen object drop(like falling) then return to previous postion. it looks like rotating white,blue\gray, and red lights on a round object.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Willits
There were no other sightings in Willits on or around August 23rd 2007
Summary: flashing red,blue white ufo repeted sightings
